typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		beer_ABV as double,
		beer_beerId as integer,
		beer_brewerId as integer,
		beer_name as string,
		beer_style as string,
		review_appearance as double,
		review_palette as double,
		review_overall as double,
		review_taste as double,
		review_profileName as string,
		review_aroma as double,
		review_time as integer,
		review_text as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		beer_beerId,
		beer_brewerId,
		beer_name,
		beer_style,
		review_appearance,
		review_palette,
		review_overall,
		review_taste,
		review_profileName,
		review_aroma
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'BeerCleaned[n].csv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ReducedcolumnbeerDB
